case.state: Wait, where am I? I was just following an intruder and got caught in her teleport magic.
Hey, Kool-Aid!
Hiya.
What did I do to deserve this?
Strip Poker? Like, a lewd game?
Oh yeah!
IT'S A BEAN PLUSHIE!
How about I give you some taiyaki to devour instead?
Ooh! I do like spaghetti.
I'll, um, do my best... i don't know why you'd want to play with a generic enemy though...
J-Just some cards to keep me going, please.
Um... I think I need some new cards.
So I give These cards back for new ones, right?
i need new cards. Go fish?
I need cards! Lots and lots of cards!
Cards please.
Halibut you give me some new cards?
I hope this is good enough to keep me from... you know.
I think I can win with this, right?
Should I show you my hand to see if it's good, ~player~?
These all look good together!
I think this is actually good!
I have no idea what I'm doing!
These cards feel good! I don't know if they really are, but still!
I don't think this is good enough!
I'm just a generic enemy. I've never played this before.
I'm new to this, so I'm just having fun.
Why are you even playing with a nobody like me, ~player~.
I think this is good?
I wish I knew what I was doing...
These cards... I actually don't know what they mean!
I'm gonna lose for sure...
This looks bad.
I don't really know what I'm doing...
This is really bad!
I think this is bad...
This hand is bad, isn't it?
I have no idea what I'm doing!
Why am I dressed like this? Because I'm a Taiyaki Girl. We all dress like taiyaki.
Without my suit... I am nothing...
Aw... Ok. I'll do my best.
I guess I'll undress. I'm not happy about losing though.
I can't believe I lost again despite not knowing how to play.
Ooh, whatcha saaay?

You had a bad day
You're taking one down
You sing a sad song just to turn it around
I have to take off my clothes, right? In public? Is this legal?
But I don't want to be a taiyaki-less Taiyaki Girl? Can't I get a do-over?
I'm dressed like bean paste or custard filled street food, don't make me lose that...
Oh no! Not this!
Ah! Why me?
Can I get a do-over? Please?
Why does it have to be me?
Aah! What did I do wrong?
If I knew how to play, I wouldn't have to take my taiyaki suit off.
Really? Me? Seriously?
Not me... please?
Not me! A do-over, please!
I don't think this is legal. I'm not going to be arrested for this, am I?
Don't get to aroused by this! I'm just a generic enemy! I'm nothing special!
I wish I knew what I was doing...
I'm sick of losing...
Am I really this big a loser?
Me? Again?
I think I screwed something up!
I think I just destroyed my taiyaki suit!
I think I broke something on my taiyaki suit!
I guess I can lose my shorts. My shirt will cover more.
My tanktop covers more, so off with the shorts, I guess.
I'd rather lose my shorts. I'll be less naked that way.
I would have trimmed up if I thought I'd end up here.
I look a little rough down there, don't I?
I should've taken some time to clean up...
I... I hope you like it...
This is really embarrassing, but I hope you like it, ~player~.
I know I'm not that good looking, but I'll let you judge for yourself.
I can't believe I lost my suit.
I was only worth three Tres?
I'm not a Taiyaki Girl now. Just a girl...
You won't be seeing too much this time.
This really is just a sneak peek.
You won't see too much this time.
You can look at me if you're embarrassed.
I can't believe I'm watching this. I promise I'm not a pervert.
Why do I like this? Why am I so excited?
So ~name~ will be undressing? How lewd...
You can strip if I can stand here without my taiyaki suit.
If I can lose half of my power, you can lose your whatever you're taking off.
Oh, how unfortunate, I'm totally not into it or anything.
If you're hesitant, just look at me. It could be worse.
I guess I like girls too...
You, um, can do it? I believe in you?
Oh my gosh, I can't believe you're actually doing this.
At least you tried?
Maybe you also need to learn how to play before playing?
As a low-level enemy, I'm not used to being successful.
You still have something. Be thankful.
I think the world would be better if everyone stopped for taiyaki more.
This is so overwhelming! I'm used to running head-on into things, but this is too much!
I bet you *fish* you hadn't lost this round. Get it? Fish? Because I'm dressed like fish-shaped ice cream?
Woo! Take it off! Sorry! That was too much.
It doesn't matter what you take off, so no pressure.
Just do your best, ~name~. I believe in you.
And you might take more off? And end up naked? No, no. I'm fine. Just a bit flustered.
Would you rather be naked like me?
I bet you wish we were playing Go FIsh right now, huh?
Sure, you lost your ~clothing~, but at least you didn't get shot by a magic energy bolt.
And you might take more off? And end up naked? No, no. I'm fine. Just a bit flustered.
It may not be much, but it's something.
I hate to say it, but just that little bit coming off got me aroused.
Who'd have thought losing something small could be so sexy?
Are those stuck in you?
You know, I wouldn't complain if I were you.
I wonder what ~name~'s favorite ice cream flavor is?
~Name~ is so much cuter than me. What am I even doing here?
I hope everyone enjoys the game. I don't want anyone to flounder.
You can do it, ~name~!
Glad you can do it without too much trouble, ~name~.
You can do it! Don't chicken out!
THEY WERE STUCK IN YOU!
While I'm sure you miss your ~clothing~, it could have been worse. You could have lost your Taiyaki suit.
You may have picked your ~clothing~, but you had a tuna options.
You may have lost your ~clothing~, but have you ever dressed like a frozen treat?
You slid headfirst into that! You might be a good Taiyaki Girl.
Lookin' good! Like a high-quality red bean taiyaki.
Not every item lost can be big. You did your best.
It's not like your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(were|was)~ important like my Taiyaki Suit was.
Keep calm, ~name~. Just focus on me if you need to.
Did you know some taiyaki is stuffed with sausage or custard. That sounded way filthier than I intended it to!
Real taiyaki needs a special mold that folds to make the shell. My suit has a zipper though.
Remember, this is just a costume, so please don't try to eat my clothes.
You lose! Which kinda means that I won!
Get dunked on by the formerly fished femme fatale, Taiyaki Girl!
I'm actually an effective enemy after all!
Just look at me and I'll chase away your anxieties even if it embarrasses me!
You might look better in a costume of your favorite sweet treat, ~name~.
You might look good in a taiyaki suit yourself. Would you like to be a Taiyaki Boy, ~name~?
Ah! You're a boy! And you're undressing! This is so embarrassing!
Aaand I'm into it.
Who's bad? I'm bad.
That was kinda cute, actually.
You can do it if someone like me can!
This is what you get for taking on a mighty Taiyaki Girl!
Wait, we don't have to get married now, do we?
Wait! I don't know if I'm ready to see this!
I can't believe I defeated someone!
I win, I win, I win! At least for one round.
I can't believe I'm not the one who lost.
Don't worry, I'll still cheer you on without your ~clothing~.
I may be prepared to slide forward to an enemy, but not to see one naked...
Most taiyaki is filled with sweet red bean paste. I based my suit on a strawberry ice cream variant.
There are also smaller versions of taiyaki called kingyoyaki, but I can't dress like one of them because the outfit would be too small.
Fleentstones?
Is that Bee Movie?
Why do Taiyaki Girls dress like taiyaki, you might ask?
I actually have no taiyaki facts. I'm just interested in seeing this.
~name~ actually looks pretty hot... Why play with me then?
I hope I don't have to follow this act. It's a hard one to follow.
Oh shoot, it's happening!
Everyone keep calm! It's just ~name~ being super sexy and stripping!
Yeah! Yeah! Yeah!
7 Grand Dad?
Why did Ray Liotta have a honey company? Answer me, Bee Movie!
I don't actually know.
This is too much for an inexperienced Taiyaki Girl like myself!
Ooh. That's good. Like a strawberry ice cream taiyaki on a warm Summer night good.
I'm thinking some impure thoughts not suitable for the noble position of a Tayaki Girl.
I really liked that. Thank you.
I'm really turned on but this is really overwhelming.
Niiice. Taiyaki Girl likey.
I really wish I was still dressed like a taiyaki.
I guess I like girls too.
Wait, you lost? Not me?
I think I like it win you lose.
Um... Fish pun? I don't know, this is too hot.
So you'll be showing me something good? I mean, I hope you're thinking about me.
Shh! We're seeing the goods?
You're seriously losing something like your ~clothing~ before I'm out? I'm just a generic enemy that stumbled into the game.
You'd be super cute dressed like a taiyaki too, ~name~!
What would people back home think of me playing such a naughty game while dressed like a taiyaki?
I don't know what's more shameful: stripping or not being as fashionable as a Taiyaki Girl.
Admit it. You wish you were dressed in a warm, comfy, aerodynamic taiyaki suit too, don't you?
I wish I could be that hot...
Am I experiencing what is sometimes called a "lady boner?" Yes.
I hope ~name~ is OK showing so much...
Nice beat.
He put on a hat?
I know that music...
Don't. Please.
It's happening! Oh my, it's happening!
Who would've thought a nobody like me would be this lucky.
I am one happy Taiyaki Girl.
I've really been waiting for some man chest.
Is it wrong I've been waiting to see this? Am I a perv now?
No! Please, no! No!
That's cheating, isn't it?

AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!
Frick me for playing...
Wht even are you?
This is way too good!
What's a Taiyaki Girl to do when presented with such a sexy body?
Oh yeah, I'm quite the pleased Taiyaki Girl.
Do I have to discard my Good Taiyaki Girl card now?
Oh yeah. Taiyaki Momma likes.
No! Please, no!
I hate every part of this.
I would like some lunch.
I wonder who this is?
Should someone with so much white fabric have red wine?
Please don't.
I've never seen a boy's thing before. Please be good.
Please be big. Please be big.
I wonder if the stories about guys being huge are true?
I'm sure people were just overselling their own sizes. I'm sure this is normal.
I was promised a big fish, not a small fry...
I know your little guy is doing his best, but I can't help but be disappointed...
That's it???
Aaw... I was hoping for more than that...
I-is it twitching?
What do I do? I like it, but I'm not sure what I want to do is legal!
Is that your fishing bait? Because I want to put my mouth on that. I can't believe I just said that! I can't believe I just said that!
So this is what they meant by big dick energy.
You're not gonna smack me with that thing and make me explode into butterflies, are you?
HE WON'T STOP COMING AND HE WON'T STOP COMING!
You are grotesque.
Ah! Front-facing Simpsons!
... What?
Throwing things is rude, you bean plushie.
I didn't need to see that.
How would I even fit that in my pussy, let alone my ass?
I don't care if it's magically enhanced or not. It's so big that I don't care.
Your dick is ... absolutely enormous!
Oh my goddesses Mati and Zizou! What is that?
It's kind of terrifying.
That's supposed to fit inside me?
I've never felt this excited to see naked breasts before.
Those look weighty. Can't wait to see them naked.
Don't mind me. I'm just enjoying the show. The "~name~ has to show everyone her boob" show.
Those are probably tiny, but I think they're still cute.
Those little things still probably look good naked.
More than a handful's a waste, right?
Seeing your breasts is a victory in and of itself, ~name~.
I don't really ever look at girls getting topless, but I like what I'm seeing so far.
Those look pretty big. We'll see if you pad them soon.
They're bigger than my head. I can't wait to see them naked.
I hope she's not stuffing her shirt.
Oh yeah! Time to let those whoppers free!

WHYISTHISLINEPLAYING?
WHATHAPPENED?
WHATDIDIDOWRONG?
Man, they're smaller than mine...
I mean, they're practically a man's chest, but men are hot too, yeah?
Cute. Tiny, but cute.
Big enough for me.
They look better than mine.
Taiyaki-rific!
They really are that big.
And those are natural?
Good for you, ~name~.
I may have come here dressed as a snack, but you're the whole meal.
I feel like a small fish-shaped baked good in a big pond.
Talk about a good pair. Not cards. Your breasts, I mean.
The icky sand monster has a better rack than I do...
This game has shown me just how much I like girls.
I wonder what you look like down there...
I can't help but be curious about what we're gonna see next.
Oh no, she's thiccer than me too!
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!
Do you... not own a trimmer or anything?
Man, I didn't expect to end up liking pubic hair this much.
Looks all cute and fuzzy. Like a peach.
This girl takes care of herself.
Dang, what a cutie.
You trimmed it all up just to show it off for us, didn't you, ~name~?
It's bald?
That's really kinda cute. Not gonna lie.
Man, who'd have thought that a random enemy like myself would get to see such a gorgeous sight?
I thought I had enough cases covered!

Please don't traumatize me.
I don't like this plushie...
Oh shoot, really? Already?
I hope ~name~ doesn't get too embarrassed.
Well, I guess you have to be prepared to do this if you play here.
What did I just say?
I've never been happier to be female.
So did you bring any toys or whatever? Not that I'm a perv who wants to see that or anything.
So are you gonna play with your butt at all or do guys not do that?

I'm way too into this...

You're rubbing it so fast! Won't it get a friction burn?

Yeah! That's a good boy.
I hate everything about this.

Could it be you're thinking about me? Probably not.

I can't believe I'm blushing because you're so hot.
Show me what you know and maybe I can learn a thing or two.
~Name~ looks so much better than I do, it's not even funny.
I think that you're cute and that I'm cute. Does that make this a Cute Girls Doing Cute Things scenario?
I can't take how perfect you are, ~name~.
Yeah! put on a show!
Your cute moans are giving me life right now.
After this game, I'd be down for some girl on Taiyaki Girl stuff.
I might have to try that myself sometime.
I hope ~name~ doesn't think I'm a perv...
She's just too sexy for me to handle!
I can't believe I've been too afraid to experience this before...
Ah. Those noises you're making are music to my ears.
That sounded like it felt good!
Just too cute!
That was... something...
I'm a little embarrassed but a lot grateful to have seen that.
I bet you could use a bath right about now, huh?
Why didn't I ever realize I found girls cute before?

I was hoping to watch someone else first to get a feel for, well, feeling myself.
I guess I can't win them all. Or at all, it looks like.
OK. Just do what you've seen others do here. No biggie.

So I just go at it?
OK. Here I go.

I hope I'm doing this right.

~Player~!

I won. Wait, I won?
